article:
This is a complete 'listing of [[National Basketball Association]] players who
have [[block (basketball)|blocked]] 10 or more shots in a game'.

43 different players have blocked 10 or more shots in a game. It has occurred a
total of 154 times (including the playoffs) in NBA history. Mark Eaton
accomplished the feat more times than anyone else in league history (19),
followed by Manute Bol (18). Eaton, Hakeem Olajuwon, and Andrew Bynum are the
only players to block 10 or more shots in a playoff game.

The NBA did not record blocked shots until the 1973â74 season.
